summary: Add the Pink Panther Theme to your sneaking or whatever you like. Suggestions and dowload links in the comment section
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]IMPORTANT: Make sure your sound file is in .wav-format. you can use whatever you like. size and length of the file doesn't matter!

[youtube]WgID0m5kmag[/youtube]

This Mod is also available for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/5449/?]Skyrim Special Edition[/url][/size]

Description
================
Add the Pink Panther Theme to your sneaking or whatever you like. Suggestions and dowload links in the comment section
This is a conversion of my original mod for Skyrim. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50724/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D50724%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D1375970&pUp=1]Check the comment section there

[/url]How to get a .wav file
================
A simple way to get your .wav file is to get on youtube, find the music you want to use (pink panther, mission impossible, teletubby theme or whatever you like) and [url=http://convert2mp3.net/index.php]convert it to mp3[/url]. then [url=http://audio.online-convert.com/convert-to-wav]convert the mp3 to wav[/url]. Use this file as explained in "Installation".

Installation
================
- Extract the file to your data folder
- Download a theme from the comment section or use your own .wav file 
- Browse into your data folder /music/pinkpanther
- place the theme there and rename it to "pinkpanther.wav" (Override the old file)
- have fun while sneaking!
author: jesuzz
